name: Bricks Breaker Shooter
description:
Bricks Breaker Shooter is a brand new ball shooter game. Your task is to fire the ball and break as many bricks as possible. This game’s gameplay, effects and sound will give you the most satisfying and relaxing moments in the day. Bricks Breaker Shooter is a good choice to kill time and training brain.

▶ How to play:
- Break all the bricks to clear the stages and get to the next level.

- Keep and adjust the ball, fire it in a touch and break as many bricks as possible..

- Hit the bricks and reduce its number until it breaks.

- Break as many bricks as possible in a shoot to collect 3 stars.

▶ KEY FEATURE:

- 3 modes available: Classic, Level and 100 balls.

- Various types of balls

- Tons of unique stage: They are unique and full of fun and amazing challenges!

- Brilliant, colorful screen, wonderful sound effect, challenging and funny gameplay with many collapses.

- Amazing Casual Game for killing time.

- Continuous update of game content and unique features

Play our now and enjoy the satisfying feeling of aiming the ball, choosing the best angle, shoot and break as many bricks as possible.
Let's try Bricks Breaker Shooter right now!
